## Single trait distribution 

How do bill lengths differ by species?
```{r}
ggplot(data=penguins, mapping=(aes(x=species, y=bill_length_mm)))+
  geom_boxplot(mapping=aes(color=species)) + theme_classic() +
  xlab("species")+ 
  ylab("bill length (mm)")
```
